name: Magic Missile
text: Target a unit in range and not adjacent to you.

name: Shocking Grasp
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: Move the target up to 1 space.

name: Expeditious Retreat
text: Move only in a straight line.

name: Burning Hands
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
Before the attack: Up to  enemy hero adjacent to the target discards a card, if able.

name: Fireball
text: Target a unit in range, not adjacent to you or to your friendly unit.

name: Sunburst
text: Target a unit at maximum range. +1 ::attack:: Attack and +1 ::range:: Range for each other spell card removed from the spellbook.

name: Vampiric Touch
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Create Undead
text: Respawn a friendly minion in an empty friendly spawn point in range in the battle zone.

name: Energy Drain
text: An enemy hero in range discards a non-basic card, if able. Your team regains 1 spent ::life_counters:: Life counter.

name: Shield
text:
**This round:** You are immune to basic attacks.
_(Cancelled if the spell is returned to she spellbook.)_

name: Shield
text:
**This round:** You are immune to basic attacks.
_(Cancelled if the spell is returned to she spellbook.)_

name: Banishment
text: Place a unit or a token adjacent to you into a space in radius.

name: Invulnerability
text: **This Round:** You are immune to non-basic attacks.

name: Dimension Door
text: Place yourself into a space at maximum radius. +1 ::area_green:: Radius for each other spell card removed from the spellbook.

name: Find Familiar
text:
Place a ::token_familiar:: Familiar token in radius.
You may remove up to three  other spell cards from the spellbook faceup.

name: Cloud Kill
text: An enemy hero in radius discards a basic card, if able.

name: Suggestion
text: If able, an enemy hero in radius moves 3 spaces in a straight line.

name: Dominate Person
text:
Target an enemy hero in radius.
Defeat an enemy minion in radius adjacent to the target.

name: Power Word Kill
text: Defeate an enemy hero in radius with no cards in hand.

name: Midas' Touch
text: Gain 1 coin for every two other spell cards removed from the spellbook.

name: Disintegrate
text: Remove a token or an enemy non-heavy minion adjacent to you.

name: Polymorph
text: Swap an enemy hero in radius with a token in radius or with an enemy minion in radius.

name: Wish
text:
Cast any spell in the Spellbook.
After you cast the “Wish” spell three times your team wins the game.
